newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - RMH Teleserv started as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - RMH Teleserv started as buy.

text.p: -- Smith Barney started RMH Teleservices Inc as a buy, a source at the brokerage said.
-- The office of advertising and marketing services analyst Alison Folino confirmed the initiation of coverage.
-- No further details were immediately available.
